name: What the HACK - An Accurate Guide to Hacking
name_original: What the HACK - An Accurate Guide to Hacking
description:
"Hacking is all about writing random stuff in a terminal and looking smart while doing it!"
                                              - Albert Einstein, probably

5 Minutes. The lives of millions are in your hands. Will you become the elite hacker you always knew you were and break through the defenses of the bomb?

Made in 4 days for the "Jam de Acasa" with the theme of:

You have only 5 minutes
